definition: U.S. federal government fiscal quarter (Q1=Oct-Dec, Q2=Jan-Mar, Q3=Apr-Jun, Q4=Jul-Sep)
Presidential administration during which the arrest occurred (Biden or Trump); Trump administration starts February 2025 (January 2025 is assigned to Biden)

allowed_values: Africa, Asia, Canada, Central America & Caribbean, Europe, Mexico, Oceania, South America
definition: Geographic region derived from arrestee's citizenship country (Africa, Asia, Canada, Central America & Caribbean, Europe, Mexico, Oceania, South America)
Total number of ICE ERO administrative arrests for the month-region combination; equals sum of custody and at-large arrests
Count of arrests made while individual was already in custody (CAP Local/State/Federal Incarceration, Custodial Arrest, Criminal Alien Program)

Count of arrests made while individual was at-large in the community (Non-Custodial Arrest, Located, Probation/Parole, 287(g), Worksite Enforcement, Patrol, Transportation Checks, Task Forces, Inspections, etc.)
Count of cases resulting in removal orders (Visa Waiver Deportation, Administrative Deportation, Judicial Deportation, Reinstated Final Order, Expedited Removal, Voluntary Departure, etc.)
Count of cases pending adjudication (Under Adjudication by IJ/BIA, Hearing Not Commenced, Credible Fear Referral, Status Claim Referral, etc.)
Count of cases with other dispositions not classified as removals or pending
Count of arrestees with unknown or unrecorded gender
Count of arrestees under 18 years of age at time of apprehension
Count of arrestees aged 18-64 years at time of apprehension
Count of arrestees aged 65 years or older at time of apprehension
